sub_title: D2C Program and Operations Director at Fontem Ventures B.V.
summary:
Possessing over 15 years of experience and significant achievements in both Commercial and Industrial Supply Chain domain. Professional and pro-active approach to customer service, optimising team potentials, developing new business strategies and implementing innovative ideas.

Specialties: 
•	E-commerce Operations Management
•	Strategy and Business Development
•	Program and Project Management
•	Talent Acquisition & Team Management
•	Demand & Initiative Planning
•	Warehousing & Distribution
•	Cost & Inventory Management
•	Continuous Improvement & LEAN

profile_positions.description:
Division: Subsidiary of Imperial Brands PLC, focused on e-vapour technology, producing leading e-cigarette brand BLU and other innovative nicotine products.
Responsibilities:
• Impartially develop and deliver a rigorous D2C end to end process and operations review
• Provide transparency of status, risks, issues, of the critical activities across D2C
• Ensure that the short term set up of D2C compliments the long term need for BLU CX
• Seamless set up and develop D2C operations capabilities
• Lead and operationalise strategic vendor management across D2C
• Develop and embed clear E2E direct to consumer KPI’s and targets for associated locations and teams
profile_positions.title: D2C Program and Operations Director

profile_positions.description:
Division: Personal Health HQ – consumer products: small domestic appliances, personal care, oral health care, mother and child care
Responsibilities: 
•	Sharpen and implement the Global D2C supply chain and consumer care strategy, in line with the overall Philips business strategy
•	Translate consumer insights and market requirements into new front end and back end features and capabilities
•	Enable and facilitate high growth rate ambitions of D2C business
•	Define, measure and continuously improve specific operations KPIs (e.g. NPS, product availability, on time delivery, case resolution time)
•	Lead team of 7 reports, managing both operational and system development activities
Achievements:
•	Post purchase consumer engagement score improvement from 45 to 58
•	95%+ product availability
•	3x revenue growth
profile_positions.title: Global E-Commerce Supply Chain Operations Lead

profile_positions.description:
Division: Personal Health – consumer products manufacturing: manual and fully automated coffee machines
Responsibilities: 
•	Diagnose existing warehousing and material flow processes, identify key pain points and drive improvement
•	Implement new ways of production lines replenishment
•	Design, tender, select the supplier and complete a new warehouse layout and equipment
•	Define, measure and continuously improve specific operations KPIs (e.g. stock accuracy, picking errors, warehouse productivity, production losses)
Achievements:
•	Stock accuracy improvement from 80% to 98%
•	Production stoppages due to materials flow reduced from 7% to 0.5%
•	25% increase in space by reconfiguring the warehouse design
profile_positions.title: Structural Improvements Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Division: Personal Health Market organization – consumer products: small domestic appliances
Responsibilities: 
•	Manage all marketing activities for Kitchen Appliances category in Czech Republic, Slovakia and Hungary: portfolio management, online and offline marketing campaigns, new product introductions, brand development
•	Category P&L management, i.e. iGM realisation and A&P spending
•	Coordinate with sales and TSM teams to ensure proper product introduction in the market, develop and/or localize marketing materials to drive brand awareness, online and offline on shelf presence
•	Actively engage global marketing teams on new product developments that serve specific market needs (features, price points, new categories, etc.)
profile_positions.title: Category Marketing Manager – Central Europe

profile_positions.description:
Division: Personal Health Market organization – consumer products: small domestic appliances, personal care, oral health care, mother and child care
Responsibilities: 
•	Manage all commercial supply chain activities for the 17 CEE markets: demand and initiative planning, warehousing and distribution activities, customer deliveries, inventory management, customer service level management
•	Enable and facilitate high growth rate ambitions of the market, as part of the market leadership team
•	Implement local and global projects and programs aiming to upgrade and continuously improve supply chain capabilities
•	Co create the global commercial supply chain strategy for Philips as part of the extended management team
•	Lead team of 25 people (8 direct and 17 indirect), including performance management, coaching, training and personal development
Achievements:
•	Customer service level @ 95%+
•	Double digit sales growth YOY
•	40% reduction of supply chain related costs (transportation & warehousing)
•	Employee engagement score @ 85+
profile_positions.title: Commercial Supply Chain Lead - CEE Markets

profile_positions.description:
Division: Balkan Markets organization - consumer products
Roles and responsibilities: 
•	Category/Brand supply and initiative planning manager – team lead
•	Program manager – Transportation Management System implementation
•	Project manager – W&D operations readiness for EU accession
•	Transportation and customs manager
profile_positions.title: Commercial Supply Chain – Balkan Markets
